channel.title: Comments on: Kings of Leon spat over drummer’s pending marriage

item.title: By: summershorts
item.dc:creator: summershorts
item.description: Idiots. He's not implying that Nathan's a bad drummer, that's obviously not true, but he's right by saying that a drummer can't water down songs - having a steady girlfriend could only have an effect on lyrics, which is mostly Caleb's job.
item.content:encoded: Idiots. He’s not implying that Nathan’s a bad drummer, that’s obviously not true, but he’s right by saying that a drummer can’t water down songs – having a steady girlfriend could only have an effect on lyrics, which is mostly Caleb’s job.

item.title: By: you're a fool
item.dc:creator: you're a fool
item.description: what do you mean "it's only the drummer getting married, so who gives a shit?" you're a fool if you think the drumming isn't an important part of the songs and nathan is clearly an important band member; it's not as if he doesn't have a say in the type of songs they play!! fooooooooool....plus he's totally how and should be single, so it does matter! :( bye bye nathan
item.content:encoded: what do you mean “it’s only the drummer getting married, so who gives a shit?” you’re a fool if you think the drumming isn’t an important part of the songs and nathan is clearly an important band member; it’s not as if he doesn’t have a say in the type of songs they play!! fooooooooool….plus he’s totally how and should be single, so it does matter! üôÅ bye bye nathan

item.title: By: haha
item.dc:creator: haha
item.description: the drums and the voice are the main parts of there sound, his grooves are insane
item.content:encoded: the drums and the voice are the main parts of there sound, his grooves are insane
